article: My name is Alice. I'm  A  ten-year-old girl. My parents are  _  . There are too many rules at my home. After school, I can't play with my friends,  _  . I have to go home to do my  _  . I often ask my mother, "Mom, can I watch TV?" She always  _  , "Do you finish your homework? If you do, it's time for  _  to play the violin." I have to practice the violin for an hour every evening. I don't like the rules at my home. Are there any rules at your home?
